special_attacks: smite evil 1/day (+1 attack and AC, +2 damage)
other_gear: banded mail, masterwork greataxe, shortbow with 20 arrows, wooden holy symbol, 28 gp

sections.body: During Combat The paladin prefers to attack with her bow before entering melee with her greataxe. She uses Power Attack unless she fights heavily armored enemies.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: Honorable outcasts are far from their homes and often found alone. Some have been questing in the wild for so long that they have lost any semblance of social graces and tact.

special_qualities: aura, code of conduct, lay on hands (1d6, 2/day), orc blood, weapon familiarity
name: Honorable Outcast
combat_gear: potion of cure light wounds, tanglefoot bags (2)
